text: This is Ignacio Herreria, sales manager at the seating systems manufacturer IMAT (Spain). Our experience with our client New Art Interior has been superb. It is a reliable, transparent partner that has supported us since the beginning. They are simply outstanding and we look forward to working with them on more projects.
Great company to deal with. Knowledgeable boss. Very good quality products by their work. Their skillset in terms of carpentry finishes and works are hard to find now locally.

I have been chasing payment from them for the past 6 months, the account did not pick up the phone call or on the line. Do not do business with them. Or better to go down to the office to ask for payment.

This company is a shrewd company, it does not respond to sub contractors and does not even pay, i advise all people dealing with them to really take note of this company and try to stay far away from these dangerous and dishonest people. Speaking from a sub-contractor myself, this company did not respond and did not pay for works rendered.

I hope everyone can be warned. Thanks
Been chasing payment from them for the past 4 months! Spoken to Mr. Chang and no one is getting back. Should have came over to see the reviews first before doing business with them.
